actionGroup.name: CategoryPresentActionGroup
actionGroup.deprecated: Do not use action groups that combine multiple workflows. Instead, use AdminOpenCategoryPageActionGroup to navigate to the admin category page, then assert that the category name is present, then use StorefrontNavigateToCategoryUrlActionGroup to navigate to the storefront category page, then assert that the category name is present.

annotations.description: Navigates to category page, asserts category is there. Navigates to storefront category page and asserts category is there. This action group will not work categories where name does NOT equal SEO.
